channel.title: Small program to search for prices HELP
channel.description:
hi there,
i wanted to make a small little program where you can type one of 100 names of an item in and you get a result which is the price of it.. i think i have to do it with java i mean like this you type in Rune-platebody and get the result 50.000 or something. and i am sure that i have to safe these data like name and the price for it somewhere but how do i do that all? Please dont tell me its in the wrong section, cause this is also a part of my server and i ve seen posts like this here already :)

@Mendorphins wrote:

Saletana:

Yep, like what moparscape has for item id list you type a keyword or the full name in and i just get the price instead of the id’s

Ah right, post the same post in the General Programming section and you might get a better response. More intellectual people hang out there.
